# [Interview #949: AMOL Signing Report - Viper, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=949#12)

#### Viper

This will probably be RAFO'd, but: Is Szeth bound to a spren?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No. He's not. Haha, I didn't RAFO that.
